title: Maid of ?hara, Pine and Plum Blossoms, Manzai Comedy, one of three panels
description: right panel; two men in light green clothing with triangular black hat with white crisscross at top; man in front peers wide-eyed and somewhat lasciviously over an open white fan with red sun in center that he holds in PR hand
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
